Text: RE Enron Credit Inc ECI consent Cc I will look at your consent document today Attached please find the standard repo documentation used by Goldman Gail Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday April AM To Cc Subject Enron Credit Inc ECI consent Gail The commercial team is pressuring for a fairly quick implementation of a repo agreement If the consent which I sent yesterday is not satisfactory please advise as soon as possible so that I can obtain a repo specific consent Also could you please submit repo documents to me for review I do not know who may have contacted you from the London group Enron Credit Ltd but we can surely coordinate That entity should have its own form of unanimous consent or resolution Thanks for your help Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Forwarded by Sara ShackletonHOUECT on AM Sara Shackleton To cc Subject Enron Credit Inc ECI consent PM Gail Attached is a form of ECI unanimous consent Will you accept fhis for the purpose of signing a repo agreement and transacting thereunder Please let me know Also you can email repo documents to me Thanks See attached file Resolution ECIdoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax papdf pbpdf

RE Enron Credit Inc ECI consent Cc The attached documents are for Goldman Sachs Co only GSI has their own documentation that they use for repo transactions I will ask my colleague in London Rossella Pagano to forward you a set of GSI agreements Gail Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April PM To Subject RE Enron Credit Inc ECI consent Gail Is the attached Master Repurchase Agreement used by both GSCo as well as GSI It looks like both Enron companies US and UK will want repos and the US company What is the difference in the forms used by GSCo and GSI Any word on the consent Thanks Sara Enron LondonDerek Lee left me a message this past Monday regarding repo agreements I assume for your London office Can you please let me know if he has received GSI Master Repurchase Agreements or if I need to follow up on my end Thank you Gail Shanley NYP th Fl New York NY
